article.class: itemscope post_item post_item_single post_featured_default post_format_standard post-8 page type-page status-publish hentry

div.p: Montessori Public Schools have existed since the early 1970’s. Members of the First State Montessori Academy have visited Montessori charter...
Ut fringilla id ligula id tincidunt. Quisque ultrices ultrices interdum. Integer posuere neque lorem, eu scelerisque mauris vulputate vel...
First State Montessori Academy exists because others have contributed to its bright future. Continued generosity is needed to keep FSMA...

h3.strong: The mission of First State Montessori Academy is to create successful, contributing, life-long learners in a Montessori public educational program for students in Kindergarten through 8th grade.

div.p: First State Montessori Academy will provide parents and students with an authentic, time-tested, Montessori education in a public school. We believe that the creation of a Montessori public school in New Castle County, DE will improve student learning, allow for greater choice for parents, and serve as a model for alternative approaches to education by providing a proven and innovative teaching and learning environment.

h1.style: color: #3c4954; width: auto; max-width: 250px; margin: 0 auto;

div.class: sc_testimonials sc_testimonials_style_testimonials-3 sc_slider_nopagination sc_slider_nocontrols sc_slider_swiper swiper-slider-container

div.div: We were extremely fortunate to get into this school. What we did not know is how much FSMA would exceed our expectations.
We continue to be grateful for the absolutely wonderful environment you have created for all children. I truly believe that you do helps to make the world a better place.
I wish I could have learned in an environment like this... I can only imagine what doors would have been opened and interests would have been peaked.
Montessori was something we always wanted for our children but was beyond our reach financially... until now. FSMA has given us an option that we never thought was feasible. Thank you, FSMA!
